location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ābu] to the Secretary to the New Bank of Bombay Limited

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that the bank advance Pelly £800 to be paid to the chancery in London on the basis of his having 30,000 rupees with the bank that cannot be accessed until Mr Narayn Vasedes will has gone through probate and stating that the bank holds £2000 of Pelly's railway stock which could be considered security for the advance.
